job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Instrument Software
job.description: strongPacBio Mission Statement Enabling the promise of genomics to better human health brbrstrongWe create the worlds most advanced sequencing technologies Our singlemolecule solutions reveal the full potential of the genome in the pursuit of better healthbrbrstronguJob SummarybrbrustrongWant to become a key player in creating the next generation of DNA sequencers Join the Instrument Control Software ICS team at PacBio were responsible for runtime control operations in all our sequencing instruments ICS manages operational hardware including robots lasers optics electromechanical devices and environmental modules to conduct DNA sequencing experiments on the instrument We are looking for an experienced software engineer to develop and deliver new features in our currently marketed sequencers as well as work on development of nextgeneration productsbrbrstronguResponsibilities And DutiesbrustrongulliDesign and code across the entire software stack in our DNA sequencersliliCollaborate with engineers scientists and program managers to deliver robust product solutionsliliCommunicate and document designs using behavioral and structural diagramsliliWrite and fix automated unit and functional testsliliPerform rootcause analysis and debug complex software systems brliulAll listed tasks and responsibilities are deemed as essential functions to this position however business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional tasks and responsibilitiesbrbrstronguQualifications And SkillsbrustrongulliBachelors andor Masters in Computer Science Engineering or other related discipline or equivalent with 3 years related experience or equivalent liliExperience writing and delivering product softwareliliExcellent coding skills and fluency in managed runtime environments such as NET or Java liliExcellent interpersonal verbal and written communication skills to be able to effectively interact with mechanical electronic quality and manufacturing engineers brliulstrongPreferred Qualifications  strong ulliKnowledge of or experience withliulliC and PythonliliNET CoreliliDiagnostic equipment or services in the life sciences industryliliDevice interfacing eg robot laser motion control sensorsbrliululstronguPersonal And Professional AttributesbrustrongulliYou believe in quality code and an agile software process with an emphasis on automated testing liliYou are selfmotivated with a growth mindsetliliYou thrive in a culture of diversity and inclusivity where individual perspectives are valuedbrliul brbrAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race sex color religion national origin protected veteran status or on the basis of disability gender identity and sexual
